mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EquipmentStat WHERE equipmentNum = #{equipmentNum} AND StatCode = #{StatCode} AND statType = #{statType};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EquipmentStat (equipmentNum, StatCode, statType, value) VALUES (#{equipmentNum}, #{StatCode}, #{statType}, #{value});
mapper.update: UPDATE EquipmentStat SET value = #{value} WHERE equipmentNum = #{equipmentNum} AND StatCode = #{StatCode} AND statType = #{statType};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EquipmentStat WHERE equipmentNum = #{equipmentNum} AND StatCode = #{StatCode} AND statType = #{statType};
